summary_and_description:
Context menu fails to load for bookmarks when network connection is slow (timeout after 2s). Using build 20021004 on WinXP

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Set network throttling to 'Slow 3G' in developer tools
2. Open bookmarks sidebar and search for any bookmark
3. Right-click a bookmark

Result:
Context menu either:
- Shows 'Loading...' indefinitely
- Fails to appear with console error: 'Network timeout fetching menu items'

Expected:
Context menu should appear with local cached data when offline/network issues occur.

Note: Works instantly on fast connections. Only affects HTTP/HTTPS bookmarks (not local file:// ones).
